title: Primetime Draven Sound Bug
body: With the Primetime Draven skin, his auto's hitting targets is playing the Pool Party Draven skin target hit sound (the splash) - instead of the microphone type sound.

replies.body:
Hello! 

Thanks for the report! I'd logged this issue the last time I saw this on the boards (I think it was last week?) I spoke to an audio engineer this week directly, explaining the issue, and he's looking into it. :)
